name: Bulldozer Blitz
description:
Dig up rocks and lay down roads so that the drivers can get from one building to another.

Bulldozer Blitz was written by John, in 26 hours for the Ludum Dare 13 competition (December 2008).

As more drivers get to their destination the city expands so you’ve got to add more roads and repair existing ones to keep up.

Drivers who reach their destination increase your city’s happiness, but those that don’t will get angry and make your city more unpleasant. The game ends when your city’s happiness hits rock bottom.

Use the arrow keys to move your bulldozer, and space to remove rocks to gain resources. Press space on empty land to build a road, and space on a damaged road to repair
